| MEROPS = SCOP = 1boo TCDB = OPM family = OPM protein = CAZy = CDD =
}} In biochemistry, the 'DNA methyltransferase' (DNA MTase) family of enzymes
catalyze the transfer of a methyl group to DNA. DNA methylation serves a wide
variety of biological functions. All the known DNA methyltransferases use S-
adenosyl methionine (SAM) as the methyl donor.
